event.event-label: OpenNMS-defined event: Circuit breaker has changed state
event.descr: A cirtcuit breaker named %parm[name]% on %dpname% has changed state from %parm[fromState]% to %parm[toState]%.
event.logmsg: Circuit breaker %parm[name]% on %dpname% changed state to %parm[toState]%

event.event-label: OpenNMS-defined event: Circuit breaker has changed state
event.descr: A cirtcuit breaker named %parm[name]% on %dpname% has changed state from %parm[fromState]% to %parm[toState]%.
event.logmsg: Circuit breaker %parm[name]% on %dpname% changed state to: %parm[toState]%
